SELECT t.`id` as id, t.`name` as name, t.`employee_id` as employee_id, d.`dname` as entrydept, p.`dname` as entrypost, t.`phonenum` as phonenum , t.`identitynum` as identitynum, t.`expectedtime` as expectedtime, t.`email` as email, t.`entryregister` as entryregister, t.`gmt_create` as gmt_create, t.`apprmsg` as apprmsg, t.`operator` as operator FROM `entry` t LEFT JOIN `dept` d on t.`entrydept` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN `post` p on t.`entrypost` = p.`id`
LIMIT #{current},#{limit}
